statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({5.34}+{6.89}\right)}={24.46}\approx{24.46}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{6.89}\cdot{4.99}={34.3811}\approx{34.4}.
